# Get Contact

# Description

Retrieves a contact in HubSspot Marketing.

# Untitled Section

# Configuration

* 
* Contact - Select the contact from the drop-down list or enter a custom contact ID. You can retrieve the company ID from the output of an event trigger, a Create Contact activity, or a List All Records → contact (object) activity. This field supports String type input.
* Fields - A comma separated list of the fields to be returned in the response. This field supports String type input.









* Contacts - Automatically generated output variable.
